name: Apollo Client errorPolicy 最小
description: errorPolicy: 'all' を使ってエラーとデータを両方扱う最小例

files.template:
import { ApolloClient, InMemoryCache, HttpLink } from '@apollo/client';
export const client = new ApolloClient({ link: new HttpLink({ uri: '/graphql' }), cache: new InMemoryCache(), defaultOptions: { watchQuery: { errorPolicy: 'all' }, query: { errorPolicy: 'all' } } });
